槵字的基本解释

槵
huàn
一种树，即“无患子”。落叶乔木，果皮可代肥皂，核可作念珠。

槵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huàn］
［《廣韻》胡慣切，去諫，匣。］
亦作“梙1”。
木名。即无患木。落叶乔木。佛家取其子做念珠，谓之菩提子。

槵字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　槵； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页548第02
【唐韻】【集韻】?胡慣切，音患。俗省作梙。【廣韻】無槵，木名。【集韻】皮子可澣。【酉陽雜俎】燒之極香，辟惡氣。一名噤婁，一名桓。【崔豹·古今註】拾?木。一名無患。昔有神巫，名寶眊，能符劾百鬼，得鬼以此棒殺之，世人以此木爲衆鬼所畏，故名無患也。　又【通雅】槵子實可去垢，核黑如?。【正字通】謂可爲念珠。引佛經云：當貫木槵子一百八個，常自隨身。

槵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
槵字的起名意思

暂无。

槵
Basic explanation of words
槵
huàn
A kind of tree, namely "Soappin". The deciduous tree, the peel can be used as a substitute for soap, and the core can be used as a rosary.
槵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huàn］
["Guangyun" Hu used to cut, go to admonish, box. ]
Also known as "梙1".
Wooden name. That is, no trouble wood. Deciduous trees. Buddhism takes his son as a rosary, which is called the Bodhi son.
槵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　槵; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 548 No. 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] Hu used to cut, sound trouble. Secular province for 梙. [Guangyun] No 槵, wooden name. [Jiyun] Pizi can be wan. 【Youyang Miscellaneous】It burns incredibly incense and dispels bad qi. One is silent and the other is Huan. [Cui Bao·Ancient and Modern Note] Picking up wood. One is innocent. In the past, there was a magical witch, named Baoya, which could charm a hundred ghosts and kill them with a stick.　[Tongya] Chanzi can actually descale, and the nuclear black is like? 【Zhengzitong】It is said that it can be a rosary. Quoting from the Buddhist scriptures: One hundred and eight dangmu chanzi, often carried by oneself.
